location.title: Cort
location.desc: Located on the first floor of the U.C. featuring a full buffet with a variety of choices. Whether you are a vegan vegetarian or a meat-lover, you'll be able to find the perfect meal to satisfy your cravings. The daily menu features al dente pasta selections, made-to-order sandwiches, burgers and more hot off the grill, home-style entrees and sides, salad bar, and a daily exhibition cooking sensation.

location.title: Rathbone
location.desc: Located across from 'Upper Cents'. Rathbone Student Restaurant is a dining facility with a tremendous panoramic view of Bethlehem. This dining facility has a unique focus on the 'Balanced Way' nutrition program.

location.title: Brodhead
location.desc: Located on the bottom of campus across from Campus Square A in Brodhead residential hall. Brodhead is a warm, contemporary and an inviting place for Brodhead residents to dine. Students love this location because of the family atmosphere and customized menu.

location.title: ASA
location.desc: Located on the University Center Third Floor. Featuring a full lunch buffet menu by our catering department. Enjoyed by faculty, staff, and students.

location.title: Bakers
location.desc: Located on the second floor of the U.C. featuring Starbuck's Coffee, this is your start me up spot all throughout the day. Begin your busy day with a large cup of coffee and your morning standard - a toasted bagel with cream cheese or an oversized muffin!

location.title: Pandinis
location.desc: Located on the second floor of the U.C. featuring an old world style and a new world flavor. Choose from a delectable combination of your favorite classics such as personal pizzas and pasta creations with a new fusion kick!

location.title: Gelato
location.desc: Located in Pandini's! Come check out the variety of delicious flavors of our genuine Italian ice cream. Psst...fyi: gelato has fewer calories and less than half the fat of traditional ice cream! Yummm.

location.title: Flame
location.desc: Our brand new location at The Food Court is sure to capture the hearts and taste buds of any and all burger and fry lovers! this hot spot specializes in top quality Angus Beef burgers and sliders with endless fresh toppings! It also features Lehigh's Signature Smokehouse sandwiches and sides.

location.title: Simply
location.desc: Serving satisfying meals on the go from crisp salads on artisan breads, wrap sandwiches, fresh fruit, veggie sticks, dessert, beverages, and more!

location.title: Mein
location.desc: The perfect balance of oriental tastes! Crunchy egg rolls, fried dumplings, hot soups, and delicious combinations of vegetables and chicken, beef or pork.

location.title: Salsa
location.desc: At this Baja-style Mexican grill, enjoy a taco, burrito, quesadilla, or any other Mexican cuisine that makes you sizzle!

location.title: Global Cafe
location.desc: Located on the second floor of the newly renovated William's Hall, Global Caf√© offers food from around the globe as well as your favorite staple items such as Peet's Coffee and Tea and Simply To Go. With an ever changing menu that samples flavors from around the world, the Global Cafe will provide you with authentic cuisine from your favorite cultures. Visit us and begin your culinary journey right here in William's Hall.

location.title: E.W.F.M Lounge
location.hours: Mon-Wed: 8:00am-11:00pm, Thurs: 8:00am - 9:00pm, Fri: 8:00am - 3:00pm, Sat: Closed, Sun: 12:00pm - 11:00pm
location.desc: Located on the lower level of the Fairchild Martinedale Library, the E.W.F.M. Lounge features Peet's Coffee and Tea. It is the perfect place to stop for a cup of delicious coffee or tea or grab a quick snack while you study or just pass by the library.

location.title: Iacocca Cafe
location.desc: Located in Iacocca Hall's Siegel Gallery on Mountaintop Campus, the Iacocca Cafe offers breakfast to go, made to oder sandwiches and salads along with grab n' go items and Peet's Coffee and Tea. We offer inside and outside seating so you can enjoy your meal during any season.

location.title: Hissho Sushi
location.desc: Sure to please any sushi lover! Featuring a wide variety of entrees from favorites like the California roll or Spicy Tuna roll to more exotic choices like the Eel or Dragon roll.

location.title: Cyclone
location.desc: Whether you choose one of our combinations or come up with your own, each Cyclone Salad is tossed fresh while you wait and served in a bowl or wrap!

location.title: Hawks
location.desc: Located inside Lamberton Hall student center. The Hawk's Nest is open extra late for you! It's the hot spot on campus for food and fun late into the evening. Everything on our menu is made-to-order. Come by and enjoy a burger with fries or a green, crispy salad.

location.title: Common
location.desc: Located in Rauch Business Center at its new location on the 2nd floor. Common Grounds is a great place to grab a healthy and fulfilling meal on the go. Delicious bagel and grilled sandwiches, sushi, soup, baked goods, coffee and now a new smoked sandwich station and milkshake and smoothie machine is offered for your dining pleasure!

location.title: FudTruk
location.desc: Lehigh's new on the go restaurant on wheels with a fresh FudTruk Logoand delicious menu to meet any passerby's on the go needs. From salads to pressed sandwiches filled with the freshest ingredients, you will be satisfied and happy you stopped to treat yourself at the Fud Truk!

location.title: 1865 House of Pi
location.desc: 1865 House of Pi is Lehigh's latest edition to our mobile line up. A wood burning brick oven pizza cart that cooks up your pizza perfectly in only 90 seconds! Featuring local ingredients with the pi made right before your eyes this pizza cart is the perfect place to stop between classes. Follow 1865 House of Pi on Twitter to find out where that delicious wood fired pizza smell is coming from.

location.title: Lucys
location.desc: Lucy's Cafe is located on the lower level of the newly renovated Linderman Library. This charming cafe offers Seattle's Best Organic Fair Trade coffee and espresso beverages and a variety of sandwiches, salads, and snacks. The perfect location for a pick-me-up before a long study session, or to relax and enjoy a good book!
